description: A provider class for managing Student data within a Flutter application, including methods for loading, adding, updating, deleting students, and handling associated state.

classes.name: StudentProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based class that manages a list of students, providing methods to load, add, update, delete students, and notify listeners of state changes.

methods.name: loadStudents
methods.description: Asynchronously loads students from the database and updates internal state.

methods.name: addStudent
methods.description: Adds a new student to the database and updates the local list.

methods.name: updateStudent
methods.description: Updates an existing student's information in the database and local list.

methods.name: deleteStudent
methods.description: Deletes a student by ID from the database and updates the local list.

methods.name: getStudentsByClass
methods.description: Returns a list of students filtered by a specific class ID.

methods.name: getStudentById
methods.description: Retrieves a student by ID, returns null if not found.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Sets the loading state and notifies listeners.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Clears the current error message and notifies listeners.
